about_the_game:
Do you rember parties? No, not those video calls where you drink alone in your living room, parties! Where you would stagger between rooms singing along to songs that you don't know the words to, wondering if the next person you accidentally spill your drink on could be THE ONE!

Well now you can recreate all of your favourite times from almost forgotten "Old World Parties" with the ANALOG PARTY SIM! Become the Host of the party, make sure your guests have a good time, enjoy the music and walk the line between being the right amount of drunk and drinking so much that they have their (now ex-) Partner's 83 year old Grandmother in a headlock while saying how happy they were to be invited... (That's a true story).

Play through three difficulty modes or try your hand at the Endless Mode, where you attempt to keep the party going forever!

This game started out as my submission to Ludum Dare 46, and excluding the particle effects and sound effects, was a completely solo effort. I hope you like it!

Don't party Digital, party Analog (Digitally).

name: Analog Party Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Resolution

short_description: A Pixel Art, 2D Casual Arcade game that takes you back to a time before video chat parties when getting drunk with friends was less Digital and more Analog.
